channel.title: HEEELLLLPPP! How do you make a surver from scratch!?!?!?!
channel.description:
Please help! i dont know a thing about it lol =\ and how do you code your surver?!?!?
Please help!

item.title: HEEELLLLPPP! How do you make a surver from scratch!?!?!?!
item.dc:creator: @M00_M00_Pk M00 M00 Pk
item.description:
@M00_M00_Pk wrote:

If you want to make a server scratch, try this:

Download MoparScape3.2/Aryan. And then open the files, and enter hybridscape.
Then, once you’ve opened HyrbidScape, Change all .class files to .java, i would recomend the "DJ JAVA DECOMPILER 3.9.9.91
Then after you’ve done that, open client.java ( Wich in .class file is clienthandler.class
Then come to a site like this and do some tutorials, to get the low down on java. And then, after some time you will be ready to host your server, do that by looking at the “HOW TO MAKE A SERVER!! TO STOP THE QUESTIONS!!!” Post in this section, wich is stickied at the top.

Read full topic
item.source: HEEELLLLPPP! How do you make a surver from scratch!?!?!?!

item.title: HEEELLLLPPP! How do you make a surver from scratch!?!?!?!
item.dc:creator: @mrrules mrrules
item.description:
@mrrules wrote:

Isuggest you start off with a source like cheezescape or testscape , you can download the sources in the download section under the download list (the thread is stickied)

Source Downloads: http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,162478.0.html

If you want to edit your source you can find tutroials in the tutroialsection. (link below)

Tut Section: http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,51.0.html

item.title: HEEELLLLPPP! How do you make a surver from scratch!?!?!?!
item.dc:creator: @frugoo_scape frugoo scape
item.description:
@frugoo_scape wrote:

[quote=“cj_macky, post:1, topic:160851”]Please help! i dont know a thing about it lol =\ and how do you code your surver?!?!?

Please help![/quote]
It’s good that you want to make something on your own, but you need the basic knowledge of the programming language that your are going to use to produce your server in. If you don’t know it then i suggest you read up on some tutorials and try to educate your self because knowledge is the only thing people can’t take away from you.

item.title: HEEELLLLPPP! How do you make a surver from scratch!?!?!?!
item.dc:creator: @lam0rman lam0rman
item.description:
@lam0rman wrote:

lol what accent is that - Surver[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 26, 2007, 01:49:50 AM[/size][hr][quote=“ry60003333, post:2, topic:160851”]Well to write a server from scratch, you would need a few months of spare time, and to be a master at Java the how the RuneScape client works. :rolleyes: If your starting a server from scratch, make a server for the 477 client :D. While your at it deob and edit the client so it connects to a private server. Oh, and you’ll need to write an update server. :eek:

Ok, I THINK you want to start your own server. Just download a source, and try to get it running.
http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,49.0.html

;)[/quote]

I think he wants to start from scratch.

item.title: HEEELLLLPPP! How do you make a surver from scratch!?!?!?!
item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

Well to write a server from scratch, you would need a few months of spare time, and to be a master at Java the how the RuneScape client works. :rolleyes: If your starting a server from scratch, make a server for the 477 client :D. While your at it deob and edit the client so it connects to a private server. Oh, and you’ll need to write an update server. :eek:

Ok, I THINK you want to start your own server. Just download a source, and try to get it running.
http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,49.0.html

Read full topic
